subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Attn: Michael,

I write to inform you that after a long deliberation on your payment file,
the governing board has finally approved your immediate payment of
Usd$13,500,000.00.

However, since your WILLED payment is already approved by the Federal
Reserve Bank USA, we must follow the due process of paying you your already
approved funds without any stumbling blocks.

Also after all the due protocols are observed and your WILLED certificate
issued to you, in order to avoid any delays to your WILLED approved
payment, kindly be informed that the transfer charges of your payment must
be deducted from your WILLED approved funds before the remittance to you
next week.

Hence, because of your destination, attached is the approved Bank
Remittance Application Form. Kindly fill in the blank spaces and swiftly
send it back to us. Upon receiving your filled form, your WILLED
Certificate will be issued to you accordingly for the immediate transfer of
your funds to you next week.

Thank you and Congratulations. We wait for the filled form to expedite the
process.
Best regards,
Dr. Cliff Wilson
Head of International Management.
